description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Nothing is cooler than non-stop zombie killing action with strategy. Introducing Smart Arrows and Ropes for the awesome adventurous action. Annihilate the zombie masses by the cool power arrows like Electric, Whirlwind or Tornadoes.
description.short: Nothing is cooler than non-stop zombie killing action with strategy. Introducing Smart Arrows and Ropes for the awesome adventurous action. Annihilate the zombie masses by the cool power arrows like Electric, Whirlwind or Tornadoes.
